GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
ACPI: APEI: do not add task_work to kernel thread to avoid memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 6ddbd411a00a6267e98757ba71def5d3615e9d85, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 7f17b4a121d0d50eca22cb1edebf0a157f3e43bf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ACPI: APEI: do not add task_work to kernel thread to avoid memory leak
